name: WPR
tagline: Six Time Winner of Midlands PR Agency of the Year
description:
Proud winners of 74 industry awards in nine years.
For over twenty years we have supported marketing teams of all shapes and sizes in their quest to build brand awareness, generate sales and drive business growth.
We have been named the Midlandsâ€™ largest PR consultancy by revenue, and we now find ourselves ranked third fastest growing agency outside London.
Together, our team combines creativity and content with exceptional credentials in the digital space across both B2B and consumer clients. We are a Twitter Elite consultancy, a Facebook account-managed agency, and a Google Partner.
Our unique convergence of creative thinkers, original copywriters, data analysts and technical minds, produces award-winning truly integrated campaigns that reach customers at every step of their buying journey. Above all, we strive to give our clients a clear, quantifiable return on their investment because we understand life client-side.
We are different. We are the art and science of communication combined.
